ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISBLANK(End_date__c),false,(OR(OR(VALUE(LEFT( End_date__c ,2)) >12,VALUE(LEFT( End_date__c ,2)) <= 00),IF( YEAR( TODAY()) < VALUE( RIGHT( End_date__c , 4)),true,false),IF( YEAR(TODAY()) = VALUE(RIGHT( End_date__c , 4)),IF(MONTH(TODAY()) < VALUE(LEFT( End_date__c , 2)),true, false), false),NOT(REGEX( End_date__c , '[0-1][0-9]/[2][0][0-9]{2}')))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Format should be MM/YYYY , Year and Month should not be the future. "Check End Date"
